DataElement.preferredName: Disease Response BM PCT Blasts At Response Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measuring the percent of cells that were blasts in the subject's bone marrow and used to make the response assessment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease Response BM PCT Blasts At Response
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.:The percent of cells that were blasts in the subject's bone marrow used to make the response assessment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: In medicine, an improvement related to treatment.

Concepts.definition: The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

Property.preferredDefinition: The percent of cells that were blasts in the subject's bone marrow used to make the response assessment.

Concepts.definition: The percent of cells that were blasts in the subject's bone marrow used to make the response assessment.

DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes: 11/14/23 Released per PCDC-U of Chicago/Mei Li. BF;4/16/23 Created for the PCDC-C3DC Aggregated Dictionary data elements. jk

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed that is a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
